page.title: 19'A DAY IN MY LIFE'-WIDNES
page.content: {..}'On Monday it's baths.On Tuesday we have P.E.On Thursday we have games,but today Friday's just a normal day.I enjoy some of the work,after assembly Mrs Wells might say"Get out your Peak Maths and start working."After dinner it is choir.We might sing"Nothing is so good it lasts eternally perfect. Situations must go wrong."Elaine Page and Barbara Dickson sing it.After tea{ if it is nice we have a steak and beefburger barbecue'{..LESLEY BARROW. {..}' At 7 am I get up.After breakfast I go for a newspaper for my Dad, I buy some sweets or football stickers as well.Sometimes I play cricket, football or ride my bike.We have dinner at 11 50 a.m.then I play out again until 2.30 p.m. when I watch "The Big Match" on T.V.At 3.20 p.m.I go to the swimming baths for half an hour.Tea is at 5.p.m.{..IAN HUGHES.
